name_localized.en: The Classmates Room, Four Bunk Beds
name_localized.es: The Classmates Room, Four Bunk Beds

short_description_localized.en: The Classmates Room, Four Bunk Beds
short_description_localized.es: The Classmates Room, Four Bunk Beds

description_localized.en:
4 Twin Bunk Beds
Internet - Free WiFi
Entertainment - Flat-screen TV with premium channels
Sleep - Premium bedding
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower, designer toiletries, and a hair dryer (on request)
Practical - Iron/ironing board and desk; free cribs/infant beds available on request
Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping
Need to Know - No rollaway/extra beds available
Non-Smoking
Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
